title.rendered: Web AI application facilitating healthcare decision-making

<title>Web-Based AI Application for Healthcare Decision-Making— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Our company designed and developed a web application for medical decision-making with the client’s existing artificial intelligence engine at its core for a biomedical advisory firm, whose goal is to assist doctors in choosing the right treatment strategies based on symptoms analysis" />
